name: spfx-list-js
title: List SPFx Versions
shortDescription: Node.js script to list SharePoint Framework (SPFx) versions installed via fnm with their Node.js versions and optionally query available versions from npm.
longDescription: This Node.js script lists SharePoint Framework (SPFx) versions installed via fnm (Fast Node Manager) along with their corresponding Node.js versions. It can also query the npm registry to show all available SPFx versions that can be installed. Features include filtering by version pattern, showing installation types (Full or Node-only), displaying configured aliases with the 'spfx-' prefix, and limiting output when querying available versions.

thumbnails.alt: Basic usage showing installed SPFx versions
Show all available versions from npm

references.name: fnm - Fast Node Manager
references.description: Fast and simple Node.js version manager
